verses.verse: ( The Blessed Fear of the LORD) ( 230 128:1-6 ) הַ֥לְלוּ <WH1984> hal·lū Hallelujah יָ֨הּ׀ <WH3050> yāh ...! ( Or Hallelu YAH, meaning Praise the LORD. This psalm is an acrostic poem, each line beginning with the successive letters of the Hebrew alphabet.) אַשְׁרֵי־ <WH835> ’aš·rê- Blessed אִ֭ישׁ <WH376> ’îš is the man יָרֵ֣א <WH3373> yā·rê who fears אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah·weh the LORD, בְּ֝מִצְוֺתָ֗יו <WH4687> bə·miṣ·wō·ṯāw in His commandments. חָפֵ֥ץ <WH2654> ḥā·p̄êṣ delights מְאֹֽד׃ <WH3966> mə·’ōḏ who greatly

גִּבּ֣וֹר <WH1368> gib·bō·wr mighty בָּ֭אָרֶץ <WH776> bā·’ā·reṣ in the land; יִהְיֶ֣ה <WH1961> yih·yeh will be זַרְע֑וֹ <WH2233> zar·‘ōw His descendants דּ֭וֹר <WH1755> dō·wr the generation יְשָׁרִ֣ים <WH3477> yə·šā·rîm of the upright יְבֹרָֽךְ׃ <WH1288> yə·ḇō·rāḵ will be blessed.

הוֹן־ <WH1952> hō·wn- Wealth וָעֹ֥שֶׁר <WH6239> wā·‘ō·šer and riches בְּבֵית֑וֹ <WH1004> bə·ḇê·ṯōw are in his house, וְ֝צִדְקָת֗וֹ <WH6666> wə·ṣiḏ·qā·ṯōw and his righteousness עֹמֶ֥דֶת <WH5975> ‘ō·me·ḏeṯ endures לָעַֽד׃ <WH5703> lā·‘aḏ forever.

זָ֘רַ֤ח <WH2224> zā·raḥ dawns בַּחֹ֣שֶׁךְ <WH2822> ba·ḥō·šeḵ in the darkness א֭וֹר <WH216> ’ō·wr Light לַיְשָׁרִ֑ים <WH3477> lay·šā·rîm for the upright — חַנּ֖וּן <WH2587> ḥan·nūn for the gracious, וְרַח֣וּם <WH7349> wə·ra·ḥūm compassionate, וְצַדִּֽיק׃ <WH6662> wə·ṣad·dîq and righteous.

טֽוֹב־ <WH2896> ṭō·wḇ- It is well אִ֭ישׁ <WH376> ’îš with the man חוֹנֵ֣ן <WH2603> ḥō·w·nên who is generous וּמַלְוֶ֑ה <WH3867> ū·mal·weh and lends freely, יְכַלְכֵּ֖ל <WH3557> yə·ḵal·kêl are guided דְּבָרָ֣יו <WH1697> də·ḇā·rāw whose affairs בְּמִשְׁפָּֽט׃ <WH4941> bə·miš·pāṭ by justice.

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> kî- Surely לְעוֹלָ֥ם <WH5769> lə·‘ō·w·lām he will never לֹא־ <WH3808> lō- ... יִמּ֑וֹט <WH4131> yim·mō·wṭ be shaken; לְזֵ֥כֶר <WH2143> lə·zê·ḵer remembered ע֝וֹלָ֗ם <WH5769> ‘ō·w·lām forever. יִהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> yih·yeh will be צַדִּֽיק׃ <WH6662> ṣad·dîq the righteous man

מִשְּׁמוּעָ֣ה <WH8052> miš·šə·mū·‘āh news; רָ֭עָה <WH7451> rā·‘āh bad לֹ֣א <WH3808> lō He does not יִירָ֑א <WH3372> yî·rā fear נָכ֥וֹן <WH3559> nā·ḵō·wn is steadfast, לִ֝בּ֗וֹ <WH3820> lib·bōw his heart בָּטֻ֥חַ <WH982> bā·ṭu·aḥ trusting בַּיהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah·weh in the LORD.

סָמ֣וּךְ <WH5564> sā·mūḵ is assured; לִ֭בּוֹ <WH3820> lib·bōw His heart לֹ֣א <WH3808> lō he does not יִירָ֑א <WH3372> yî·rā fear, עַ֖ד <WH5704> ‘aḏ until אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> ’ă·šer- יִרְאֶ֣ה <WH7200> yir·’eh he looks in triumph בְצָרָֽיו׃ <WH6862> ḇə·ṣā·rāw on his foes.

פִּזַּ֤ר׀ <WH6340> piz·zar He has scattered abroad נָ֘תַ֤ן <WH5414> nā·ṯan his gifts לָאֶבְיוֹנִ֗ים <WH34> lā·’eḇ·yō·w·nîm to the poor; צִ֭דְקָתוֹ <WH6666> ṣiḏ·qā·ṯōw his righteousness עֹמֶ֣דֶת <WH5975> ‘ō·me·ḏeṯ endures לָעַ֑ד <WH5703> lā·‘aḏ forever; ( Cited in ) קַ֝רְנ֗וֹ <WH7161> qar·nōw his horn תָּר֥וּם <WH7311> tā·rūm will be lifted high בְּכָבֽוֹד׃ <WH3519> bə·ḵā·ḇō·wḏ in honor.

רָ֘שָׁ֤ע <WH7563> rā·šā‘ The wicked man יִרְאֶ֨ה׀ <WH7200> yir·’eh will see וְכָעָ֗ס <WH3707> wə·ḵā·‘ās and be grieved; שִׁנָּ֣יו <WH8127> šin·nāw his teeth יַחֲרֹ֣ק <WH2786> ya·ḥă·rōq he will gnash וְנָמָ֑ס <WH4549> wə·nā·mās and waste away; תַּאֲוַ֖ת <WH8378> ta·’ă·waṯ the desires רְשָׁעִ֣ים <WH7563> rə·šā·‘îm of the wicked תֹּאבֵֽד׃ <WH6> tō·ḇêḏ will perish.
